properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v2 v2 v2 v2

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: God in Heaven and in this place.

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: Father, we commit to You this day.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: God in pleasure, God in pain

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: God in gladness and God in strife.

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: Father, we commit to You our lives.

verse.name: v2f
verse.lines: For we know that You are faithful through the stillness and the storm

verse.name: v2g
verse.lines: For You've been with us from the start.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Father, we commit to You our hearts.
